proximity-mines.author: Fantasy Flight Games
proximity-mines.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
proximity-mines.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
proximity-mines.name: Proximity Mines
proximity-mines.ability: Before deploying fleets, you may discard this card to place a number of proximity mine tokens equal to half your engineering value, rounded down. You may place these mines anywhere in the play area beyond distance 5 of enemy ships (and distance 1 of each other).
